DOC.brief_summary: Will use visual analog scales to compare effectiveness of traditional hematoma block vs ultrasound guided hematoma block with regards to pain. This will be done for closed forearm fractures.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Study of Using Ultrasound Guidance for Hematoma Blocks vs. Traditional Approach
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 Closed forearm fracture Mentally impaired, visually impaired or deaf Age < 18 Alcohol on board
